Articles.Content:
I see some posts about how difficult EVA can be, so I thought I'd make an instructional video:

Junior Kerbonaut Edfry Kerman demonstrates the use of the Kerbonaut Maneuvering Unit (KMU) Mk Ia.

Sadly, the engineers at KSP neglected to design the Mk I prototype with hydrogen peroxide tanks, resulting in the untimely, but hardly unsurprising death of Senior Test Pilot Hudmore Kerman. As a result the Mk I KMU prototype was redesigned, resulting in the Mk Ia KMU seen in this training video.
